text: - Nerve that controls the larynx (voice box).       - Sternum (chest bone) or backbone.        - Carina (where the trachea joins the bronchi).                         Stage IV     In stage IV, the tumor may be any size and cancer may have spread to lymph nodes. One or more of the following is true:            - There are one or more tumors in both lungs.     - Cancer is found in fluid around the lungs or the heart.     - Cancer has spread to other parts of the body, such as the brain, liver, adr
